item.title: Ocean2K 400year Coral Data and Tropical SST reconstructions (2015) V1.0
item.description: PAGES Ocean2K 400year Coral Data and Tropical SST reconstructions # Access data (WDS Paleo) - Access Publication This database presents four 400-year long regional sea surface temperature reconstructions for four regions in the tropics - the Eastern Pacific, the Indian Ocean, the Western Atlantic Ocean, and the Western Pacific. The reconstructions are based on a database made up of 57 marine paleoclimate datasets, all sourced from tropical coral archives.
